CustomField.description: If checked, a victim record that would normally be reparented would instead be cloned. This is useful for master-detail relationships that don't allow reparenting.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, a victim record that would normally be reparented would instead be cloned. This is useful for master-detail relationships that don't allow reparenting.
CustomField.label: Clone Reparented Victim
